## LinearCardContainer.toggleSelected() method

Toggles the selection state of the given card.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toggleSelected(index: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of the card to toggle. |

**Returns:**

boolean
